original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 319.50/321.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 319.50/321.00 to the US dollar on Thursday, weaker from yesterday’s close of 314.50/315.00 to the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 13.10/25 percent down from closing at 13.60/60 percent on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 closed at 13.40/50 percent up from closing at 13.50/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 14.25/40 percent stable from closing at 14.25/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 14.45/60 percent up from closing at 14.50/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.85/16.00 percent up from closing at 15.10/20 percent. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
